faqDescription:
Find quick answers to common questions about our website, products, and services.
Reach out to us directly with your inquiries, feedback, or support requests.

If you need help, please contact us.

questions.question: ❓ What is DogWalker and what is $DWT?
questions.answer: DogWalker is a Web3-based platform connecting pet owners with verified dog walkers. The $DWT token is the native utility token of the DogWalker ecosystem, used for staking, rewards, and in-app transactions.

questions.question: ❓ How can I earn with DogWalker?
questions.answer:
You can earn in two ways:
• Staking $DWT tokens and receiving up to 15% annual rewards.
• Offering dog walking services and getting paid in $DWT tokens.

questions.question: ❓ What is staking and how does it work?
questions.answer: Staking means locking your $DWT tokens in the platform’s smart contract to support the network. In return, you earn passive rewards based on your share in the staking pool.

questions.question: ❓ How much can I earn by staking $DWT?
questions.answer: The estimated reward is 15% annually (1.25% monthly / 0.041% daily). Rewards are calculated dynamically based on the amount staked and the total pool.

questions.question: ❓ Is there a minimum amount to stake?
questions.answer: There is no strict minimum, but we recommend staking at least 100 DWT to see meaningful returns and cover gas costs efficiently.

questions.question: ❓ When can I claim my rewards?
questions.answer: You can claim your rewards at any time by clicking the “Claim Rewards” button. Your tokens will be sent directly to your wallet.

questions.question: ❓ Can I unstake my tokens?
questions.answer: Yes, you can unstake your tokens at any moment. However, in the future the platform may introduce vesting or cooldown periods for security and sustainability.

questions.question: ❓ Is DogWalker safe?
questions.answer: DogWalker uses audited smart contracts and operates on the BNB Smart Chain, ensuring high security and low transaction fees. Always use a secure wallet and never share your private keys.

questions.question: ❓ Where can I buy $DWT tokens?
questions.answer: You can purchase $DWT directly through our platform or via supported DEX platforms (coming soon). Make sure your wallet is connected to the BNB Smart Chain.
